message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but you'll get a chance to propose next round.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, considering you get a much bigger discount on each round. This will allow us to both get a decent amount.
Let's be realistic. My discount is much steeper, so I'm willing to give up a bit more. This is still a good deal for both of us, considering the declining value of the money.
